full_threads.body:

Dropbox is a great idea. I will explore the GF Dropbox add-on. I'll let you know if I run into issues setting it up.

Thank you
Karlo

Hi Karlo,

We can adjust max file size upload or as an alternative create another field for a google drive link, a dropbox link or something similar (We just have to be very careful upon clicking these links).

action.text: Joel Maligalig assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Joel/ Chris

Can I please get your advice on having an upload option in the form? Gravity forms lets you control the file size, type. But is this safe in terms of website security? Ideally, we would like to make it as easy as possible for the user - instead of asking them to email it separately to us. Thanks



Karlo Aliling​​​​

Design Lead

MS Australia

1300 010 158

Hi Chris/Joel,

I am currently working on a form and could not figure out why the existing CSS is not applied to a paragraph field (red border, radius, etc). Can you please have a look when you can? Here's the link to the page: https://www.msaustralia.org.au/awards/


Also, is it possible to add a white background in the upload field? By default it's transparent.

Thank you
Karlo
